description:
8.33 aloop
Loop audio samples.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: aloop

options.description: Set the number of loops. Setting this value to -1 will result in infinite loops. Default is 0.
options.name: loop

options.description: Set maximal number of samples. Default is 0.
options.name: size

options.description: Set first sample of loop. Default is 0.
options.name: start

options.description: Set the time of loop start in seconds. Only used if option named start is set to -1.
options.name: time
